title: Shoot Low, Boys--They're Ridin' Shetland Ponies: In Search of True Grit
description: "Imagine Andy Rooney with a Georgia accent." The Houston PostJohn Wayne had it. True Grit, that is. Bestselling humorist and philosopher Lewis Grizzard looked for other Americans with true grit. What he found will make you laugh and perhaps even wipe away a tear. True Grit. The people in this book have it. And so does Lewis Grizzard.
author: Lewis Grizzard
